R.content: Derrida speaking from the bottom of his heart: the excessive gift goes straight to his heart, to what he holds dear, to what holds him to life > any words of welcome (hospitality) too modest
R.linkedContent: Derrida speaking from the bottom of his heart: the excessive gift goes straight to his heart, to what he holds dear, to what holds him to life > any words of welcome (hospitality) too modest

FK.content: holding-back, restraint (halte), inhibition, modesty: universal structure of religiosity, mystical immunity of the secret > not w/out intuitive violence, to that which remains unscathed
FK.linkedContent: holding-back, restraint (halte), inhibition, modesty: universal structure of religiosity, mystical immunity of the secret > not w/out intuitive violence, to that which remains unscathed

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s silence (among friends), imperative/enigma of sense of decency (pudeur) [Why I am a Destiny]: an erasure w/out erasure, everything is possible in this silence > silence as interruption that substitutes testimony for know-how, faith for the test, the perhaps for certainty, other for same, friendship for calculation: different way of thinking among
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s silence (among friends), imperative/enigma of sense of decency (pudeur) [Why I am a Destiny]: an erasure w/out erasure, everything is possible in this silence > silence as interruption that substitutes testimony for know-how, faith for the test, the perhaps for certainty, other for same, friendship for calculation: different way of thinking among

POOF.content: no silence among friends w/out laughter, which bares its teeth like death, doing evil & laughing at evil (not laughing it away) among friends
POOF.linkedContent: no silence among friends w/out laughter, which bares its teeth like death, doing evil & laughing at evil (not laughing it away) among friends

POOF.content: what chance does a feminine friend have on a stage where truth must always be veiled, prudent, where even the perhaps’ indecency might still ask truth, woman, to remain in veils
POOF.linkedContent: what chance does a feminine friend have on a stage where truth must always be veiled, prudent, where even the perhaps’ indecency might still ask truth, woman, to remain in veils

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s veiled truth of decency > do veil & decency signify absence of courage?
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s veiled truth of decency > do veil & decency signify absence of courage?

POOF.content: the dative version of omega ω would produce the meaning: ‘too many friends means no friend’ > this is the recoil (repli) version, more modest, it does reopen the question of “how many?”
POOF.linkedContent: the dative version of omega ω would produce the meaning: ‘too many friends means no friend’ > this is the recoil (repli) version, more modest, it does reopen the question of “how many?”

POOF.content: via Heidegger, philía as opening, accord, in essential relation w/ phúsis as covering up, dissimulation of self > phúsis qua philía: l’une, comme l’autre, garde ce rapport à la fois généreux et jaloux à elle-même—elle aime à se cacher, krúptesthai phileîn > le retrait de la pudeur [decency] donne ici le mouvement même: gives the gift (donne le don), accords phúsis and philía
POOF.linkedContent: via Heidegger, philía as opening, accord, in essential relation w/ phúsis as covering up, dissimulation of self > phúsis qua philía: l’une, comme l’autre, garde ce rapport à la fois généreux et jaloux à elle-même—elle aime à se cacher, krúptesthai phileîn > le retrait de la pudeur [decency] donne ici le mouvement même: gives the gift (donne le don), accords phúsis and philía

POOF.content: via Kant, the deception linked to modesty is moral & egalitarian, creates distance btwn sexes, saves other from degradation, becoming-technical, instrumentalization of jouissance
POOF.linkedContent: via Kant, the deception linked to modesty is moral & egalitarian, creates distance btwn sexes, saves other from degradation, becoming-technical, instrumentalization of jouissance

POOF.content: modesty would get woman to participate in universal fraternity (i.e. humanity), equalizes sexes by moralizing them: modest woman is a brother for man
POOF.linkedContent: modesty would get woman to participate in universal fraternity (i.e. humanity), equalizes sexes by moralizing them: modest woman is a brother for man

POOF.content: woman doesn’t become any less desirable! modesty belongs to history qua fraternization
POOF.linkedContent: woman doesn’t become any less desirable! modesty belongs to history qua fraternization

POO.content: “the secret remains intact, my politeness [see S p. 8] unblemished, my reserve unbreached, my modesty more jealous than ever [see TB p. 124]” (respond w/out responding)
POO.linkedContent: “the secret remains intact, my politeness [see S p. 8] unblemished, my reserve unbreached, my modesty more jealous than ever [see TB p. 124]” (respond w/out responding)

PAS.content: logic of double band arrests laughter and shamelessness (l’impudeur) when they shield themselves (se défendent) against anguish and affirmation > contamination btwn laughs and violations is inevitable
PAS.linkedContent: logic of double band arrests laughter and shamelessness (l’impudeur) when they shield themselves (se défendent) against anguish and affirmation > contamination btwn laughs and violations is inevitable

ROP.content: [everyone has analyzed “Dream of Irma’s Injection,” so, modest Derrida, will add nothing, only differance, the something other than sense itself in the interpretation]
ROP.linkedContent: [everyone has analyzed “Dream of Irma’s Injection,” so, modest Derrida, will add nothing, only differance, the something other than sense itself in the interpretation]

SP.linkedContent: Nietzsche: modesty of life, veils: “Yes, life is a woman!” [see p. 59 truth becomes profound by disguising of pudendum, by modest veil that falls over it]

SP.content: pratique stylet, pratique stylée, de quel genre? can’t be written w/out conjoined fabulation of woman/truth, entre la femme, in spite of the profundity that is modesty
SP.linkedContent: pratique stylet, pratique stylée, de quel genre? can’t be written w/out conjoined fabulation of woman/truth, entre la femme, in spite of the profundity that is modesty

ATIA.content: the shame of being ashamed, naked before his cat
ATIA.linkedContent: the shame of being ashamed, naked before his cat

ATIA.content: since there is no nudity in “nature,” we have to think shame and technicity together, as the same “subject” [clothing derives from technics: onuse&abuseofcleavage]
ATIA.linkedContent: since there is no nudity in “nature,” we have to think shame and technicity together, as the same “subject” [clothing derives from technics: onuse&abuseofcleavage]

ATIA.content: man can never be naked once he has the sense of shame or modesty
ATIA.linkedContent: man can never be naked once he has the sense of shame or modesty

ATIA.content: to not be ashamed of shame: time when Adam called animals’ names before the fall [to think of his shame of shame before his cat, Derrida must call upon this other time]
ATIA.linkedContent: to not be ashamed of shame: time when Adam called animals’ names before the fall [to think of his shame of shame before his cat, Derrida must call upon this other time]

ATIA.content: “why would a man be at the same time more and less modest than a woman?”
ATIA.linkedContent: “why would a man be at the same time more and less modest than a woman?”

ATIA.content: sentiment of shame related to standing upright, rhythmic difference btwn erection/detumescence
ATIA.linkedContent: sentiment of shame related to standing upright, rhythmic difference btwn erection/detumescence

ATIA.content: Cain’s shame, like a second original sin, he needs to hide his nakedness, his crime, he feels excessively culpable > but, isn’t all wrongdoing excessive, le défaut devant le “il faut”
ATIA.linkedContent: Cain’s shame, like a second original sin, he needs to hide his nakedness, his crime, he feels excessively culpable > but, isn’t all wrongdoing excessive, le défaut devant le “il faut”

ATIA.content: Bellerophon’s modesty, shame before the immodest women saves the city, this immunizing drive, Heidegger’s Verhaltenheit, restraint, is the origin of the religious, of the immune, sacred (heilig), holy, separate (kadosh) [it also can be perverted: auto-immunity; virtual, analogical relation btwn auto-biography & auto-immunity]
ATIA.linkedContent: Bellerophon’s modesty, shame before the immodest women saves the city, this immunizing drive, Heidegger’s Verhaltenheit, restraint, is the origin of the religious, of the immune, sacred (heilig), holy, separate (kadosh) [it also can be perverted: auto-immunity; virtual, analogical relation btwn auto-biography & auto-immunity]

ATIA.content: autobiographical animal, the general singulars “I” and “animal,” before ego cogito both living, both auto-affective, both moving > “I” speaks to “engage nudity w/out shame,” untenable pledge > bring in a mirror (une psyché), is the animal caught there too? or my primary mirror?
ATIA.linkedContent: autobiographical animal, the general singulars “I” and “animal,” before ego cogito both living, both auto-affective, both moving > “I” speaks to “engage nudity w/out shame,” untenable pledge > bring in a mirror (une psyché), is the animal caught there too? or my primary mirror?

ATIA.content: atuphos [not the wind blown by prideful Typhon] means to be modest
ATIA.linkedContent: atuphos [not the wind blown by prideful Typhon] means to be modest

ATIA.content: like everybody else [Rousseau, for sure], Freud said women are naturally more modest than men > but, modest/shame is so self-contradictory (aporetic): the most modest are the least

ATIA.content: it is exactly where there is sexual difference, that a hunting game of erotic modesty occurs, thus the order of law not limited to human, because inseparable from truth (inseparable from veil of modesty)
ATIA.linkedContent: it is exactly where there is sexual difference, that a hunting game of erotic modesty occurs, thus the order of law not limited to human, because inseparable from truth (inseparable from veil of modesty)

ATIA.content: wouldn’t hetero-narcissism of sexual coupling give animals the right to modesty/shame, sensitivity to nakedness?
ATIA.linkedContent: wouldn’t hetero-narcissism of sexual coupling give animals the right to modesty/shame, sensitivity to nakedness?

ATIA.content: what right should be given to this double metonymy: 1) speak of modesty whenever there’s monstration/simulation/dissimulation 2) declare animal modesty exists
ATIA.linkedContent: what right should be given to this double metonymy: 1) speak of modesty whenever there’s monstration/simulation/dissimulation 2) declare animal modesty exists

ATIA.content: is all “hiding of oneself” modesty? is there modesty not directed toward genitalia? the metonymy has been arrested/concentrated on phallic region
ATIA.linkedContent: is all “hiding of oneself” modesty? is there modesty not directed toward genitalia? the metonymy has been arrested/concentrated on phallic region

ATIA.content: modesty, for humans, concentrated on genitals, on phallus, Derrida hypothesizes that criterion here is of uprightness (droiture) as erection in process of hominization
ATIA.linkedContent: modesty, for humans, concentrated on genitals, on phallus, Derrida hypothesizes that criterion here is of uprightness (droiture) as erection in process of hominization

SW.linkedContent: complaint (of exhaustion) & accusation lodged against matrix of discourse of veil

SW.content: complain about myself to myself: immodesty, impudence > but veil makes modest
SW.linkedContent: complain about myself to myself: immodesty, impudence > but veil makes modest

SW.content: complaint: give up all modesty, most elementary politeness
SW.linkedContent: complaint: give up all modesty, most elementary politeness

PIO.linkedContent: invention (new, original, unique) breaks w/ rhetoric of modesty (convention, etiquette, contract) > w/ all conditions of social interaction

WAP.content: as much modesty as coyness in my irony > still, seriousness of concept never absent

DPi.content: Kant: man of honor values honor more highly than life, willing to accept DP, but a scoundrel considers it better to live in shame then not at all
DPi.linkedContent: Kant: man of honor values honor more highly than life, willing to accept DP, but a scoundrel considers it better to live in shame then not at all

C.content: Derrida refers to the modesty of stopping at 127, of saying “that’s enough” > then, because (even if unconsciously) the # is prime, he finds in 127, a proud arrogance (superbe morgue)

TN.content: death threatens the promise (promise of death), giving to see the mortuary mask in the face beyond face; less the “already-ethical” of caress/profanation than a remainder of shame (reste de honte), of profanation/treachery/perjury in the ethical

TN.content: “loi du tact: tout commence, et la fidélité même, et le serment, par un impardonnable parjure”
TN.linkedContent: “loi du tact: tout commence, et la fidélité même, et le serment, par un impardonnable parjure”

TN.content: Nancy: [breast or heart?] the word for modesty w/out shame

TN.content: la loi marque ainsi le sans dan le sens ou dans l’existence ——a “must (devoir)” worthy (digne) of the name must remain foreign to an economy of debt [w/out alibi]

AD.linkedContent: Levinas conscious of immense responsibility w/ modesty of prophet

OG.content: acc. Rousseau, God gave man reason and woman modesty to supplement (a lack = an excess), restrain, guide natural inclinations, & God gave a bonus (praemium) too, a recompense, reward [for correct usage of supplement], a supplement to the supplement [Christianity]

CIR.content: dying of a shame in which I persevere all the more in that I have nothing to do w/ it

EU.content: Derrida’s going to add a “modest supplement” to Antoine Berman’s L’épreuve de l’étranger: supplementarity (itself) [dick]—problematic of onto-theology in certain concept of translation

FV.content: for Freud, dreams of nakedness don’t exhibit penis or absence of penis but absence of phallus, absence of attribute supplementing a possible fault, absence of colossal double > following chain is indicated: truth-unveiled-woman-castration-shame [Schreber]

FV.content: if dream of nakedness is a dream of shame, nakedness is not natural: its truth is in shame
FV.linkedContent: if dream of nakedness is a dream of shame, nakedness is not natural: its truth is in shame

FV.content: hidden theme of Emperor’s… is the hidden theme, text as its theme, text as veil, movement of alētheia
